mapper.select: select name, value from ( SELECT ip_info AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM nb_log WHERE ip_info != '未知' AND ip_info != '' GROUP BY ip_info ) where rownum <= 10

SELECT to_char(l.time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as item, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM nb_log l WHERE 1=1 AND l.time >= add_months(sysdate,-30) AND l.url NOT LIKE '%' || '/management/' || '%' AND l.url NOT LIKE '%' || '/upfiles/' || '%' GROUP BY to_char(l.time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') ORDER BY to_char(l.time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') DESC
SELECT browser AS name, COUNT(1) as value FROM nb_log WHERE browser != 'Unknown' GROUP BY browser
select count(1) from nb_log l where to_char(l.time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
mapper.delete: delete from nb_log where to_date(to_char(t.time, 'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') - to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= 31
